o.text: Close all other windows (Current window only)

h.text: Jump to the split on the left

l.text: Jump to the split to the right

L.text: Swap with the split to the right

H.text: Swap with the split to the left

F.text: Open file picker at current working directory

y.text: Join and yank selections to clipboard

k.text: Show docs for item under cursor

C-c.text: Edit breakpoint condition on current line

C-l.text: Edit breakpoint log message on current line
